entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ScrollView sizing issue in Grids in iOS #16456
  • not work scroll to end listview #16455
    .NET 8
  • Memory Leak issue in CheckBox #16450
  • Control Templates doesn't trigger TapGestureRecognizer for elements #16449
  • .net 7 and .net 8 Push notification set up - issue with Xamarin.GooglePlayServices.Base #16448
  • Cannot upgrade Xamarin to MAUI - VS 2022 for Mac #16446
  • Border's corner radius applied to child's top left corner in Windows, iOS and MacCatalyst #16444
    Backlog
  • CollectionView scrolling delay when it contains multiple data templates with complex layouts #16443

Closed

  • Editor inside VerticalStackLayout automatically grows vertically on Android/WinUI but not on iOS #3425
    .NET 8
  • What is the support for Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Forms #8699
    Backlog
  • Can .net maui have better support for AppWidget in mobile segments? #9608
    Backlog
  • Placeholder font size not applied in editor on macOS and iOS #15750
    .NET 8
  • Editor Placeholder displays incorrectly on iOS #15792
    .NET 8 GA
  • Having problems with maui. #16312
  • Error JAVAC0000 error: no suitable constructor found for BaseCellView(Context,AttributeSet,int,int) #16278
  • Contentpage Children not append with another content page #16445
  • Shadow Radius on API 33 not fixxed #16440
  • My shadows are not rendering correctly on Samsung S21 [API 33] #16311

PullRequests

Created

  • Locate MAUI VIew for PlatformView #16463
  • [release/8.0.1xx-preview7] Fix EntryCellRenderer to use FromHandler for text changes #16462
  • Add `dotnet-local` scripts to make using in tree dotnet easier. #16461
  • [build] Remove the old step for vs insertion on release #16457
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net8.0] Make UpdateBackground public #16453
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 8 GA

Merged

  • [iOS] Re-enable editor tests #16365
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, control-editor
  • [compatibility] Skip test on iOS #16452
    migration-compatibility
  • Fix EntryCellRenderer to use FromHandler for text changes #16458
  • [Essentials] Make PublisherName public on NET8 #16454
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞, .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Fix Editor placeholder issues #15883
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label, i/regression, .NET 8 GA
  • [uitests] Fix appium script #16451
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [tests] Fix device tests to run on arm64 #16408
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16427
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [ci] Run Codesign Verification after MSI creation #16423

Updated

  • Add Position property to DragStartingEventArgs and DragEventArgs #16335
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
  • [net7.0] Make CollectionView on iOS measure to content size #15652
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [net7.0] Revert default for UseSafeAreaProperty to value from .NET 6 for iOS #16379
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [ios] fix memory leak in TimePicker #16265
    memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 GA
  • Document Element #16299
    area/docs 📓, .NET 8
  • Adds prompts when creating a new page. #16331
    community ✨, backport/suggested, .NET 8 GA
  • Remove Debug and Release Entitlements plists and Replace with Custom Entitlements #16355
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄, Blazor ❤️ MAUI, .NET 8 GA
  • [ios] fix memory leak in SearchBar #16383
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 GA
  • Reduce Confusion of DateSelected Event in DatePicker (Split Into DateSelected and DateChanged) #16153
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-datetimepicker, Under Consideration
  • Fix menu item command binding (#13848) #14345
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-menubar, Under Consideration
  • Fix OnBackButtonPressed on iOS (#8296) #14137
    community ✨, Under Consideration
  • Fix DataTrigger behavior that can cause some strange inconsistencies #15655
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix SwipeView not swiping using Label as direct content #14824
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview, Under Consideration
  • [windows] ReadyToRun packages ahead of time #11744
    platform/windows 🪟, area/perf 🏎️, .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Avoid crash setting custom icon in SearchHandler #14634
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, Under Consideration
  • Fix: Binding doesn't respect special IValueConverter return values #12060
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, Under Consideration
  • [X] Optimize OnPlatform element syntax #5611
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Allow full screen videos from WebView #15472
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, Under Consideration
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Fix issue loading images from Stream #16162
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-image, Under Consideration
  • Fix Graphics Font comparison method #15985
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, Under Consideration
  • Remove "IsPresented/ShouldShowSplitMode" check #13497
    area/FlyoutPage, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix default Switch Style #16252
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/templates 📄, area/controls 🎮, control-switch, Under Consideration
  • Fix Label Multilinetruncation (MaxLines / LineBreakMode) #14918
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label, .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Fix ScrollTo method issues #15984
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, layout-scrollview, .NET 8 GA
  • Implement Additional PointerGestureRecognizer Platform Arguments #16426
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures
  • Reinstate IContentView and ILayout methods #16411
    area/layout 🔲, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fix issues with ScrollView on ios that does not correctly resize when… #15460
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨
  • [Android] Fix issue setting CarouselView position on Ctor or Appearing #16165
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃, .NET 8 GA
  • Add a UI test for tapping on a label span #16222
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Setting binding on Label doesn't set text to incoming binding #16410
    .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Changes in Border clipping part #15856
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-border, i/regression, .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Fix Keyboard.Numeric issue on DisplayPromptAsync #16163
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert, area/keyboard, .NET 8 GA
